title: [K-12] Remote Indigenous Design Education Program: Place-Based Collaborative Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic design principles and experience using digital devices
context.additional_context: Designed for learners with cultural backgrounds similar to Australia’s remote Indigenous communities, this design education program reflects local characteristics to contribute to students’ self-actualization and community development

learning_goals: Learners investigate three local cultural elements (traditional patterns, festivals, foods, etc.), complete a design project (poster or model) reflecting them, and achieve a "Distinction" grade in ≥2 of three teacher-evaluation rubric items (creativity, cultural accuracy, visual expression).
Learners can strengthen digital literacy during the design production process using digital tools.
Learners can develop prototype designs that address community issues through collaborative learning.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
